name: Home Madness
description:
Man and Woman fighting against their rotting household. Quick, help them before their life turns into the ruin! 

Main goal is to keep house from ruin as long as you can!

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020

You can download full project source HERE

PC Controls:

  • Player 1:
    • Arrows  - Moving
    • R-Ctrl - Repair/Pickup item
  • Player 2:
    • WASD - Moving
    • E - Repair/Pickup item
